instruction: How can failure help us to become better?
output: Failure can help us become better by teaching us the importance of perseverance, resilience, and critical thinking. It can show us our strengths and weaknesses and help us focus on improving the former while addressing where we need help in the latter. It can make us more mindful of the consequences of our actions, inspire us to come up with creative solutions to solutions and push us to take risks and think outside the box. Finally, it can give us the experience and insight to be prepared for a similar challenge in the future.
